import pandas as pd

def analyze_csv(csv_file_path):
    """"""
    df = pd.read_csv(csv_file_path)
    print('Top Rows:')
    print(df.head())
    print('\nBottom Rows:')
    print(df.tail())
    print('\nColumn Names:')
    print(df.columns)
    print('\nNumerical Information Summary:')
    print(df.describe())
    print('\nData Types of Each Column:')
    print(df.info())
    return df

import pandas as pd

def analyze_csv(csv_file_path):
    """
    Analyze a CSV file using pandas DataFrame.
    
    Parameters:
    csv_file_path (str): Path to the CSV file.
    
    Returns:
    df (DataFrame): A pandas DataFrame containing the CSV data.
    """
    df = pd.read_csv(csv_file_path)
    print('')
    print(df.head())
    print('\nBottom Rows:')
    print(df.tail())
    print('\nColumn Names:')
    print(df.columns)
    print('\nNumerical Information Summary:')
    print(df.describe())
    print('\nData Types of Each Column:')
    print(df.info())
    return df

import pandas as pd

def analyze_csv(csv_file_path):
    """
    Analyze a CSV file using pandas DataFrame.
    
    Parameters:
    csv_file_path (str): Path to the CSV file.
    
    Returns:
    df (DataFrame): A pandas DataFrame containing the CSV data.
    """
    df = pd.read_csv(csv_file_path)
    print('Top Rows:')
    print(df.head())
    print('\nBottom Rows:')
    print(df.tail())
    print('\nColumn Names:')
    print(df.columns)
    print('\nNumerical Information Summary:')
    print(df.describe())
    print('')
    print(df.info())
    return df
